data.prayer: Lord, please make the same Spirit that raised Jesus from the dead give life to those who are called by his name in the county of Ernakulam.
data.verse: But if the Spirit of him who raised up Jesus from the dead dwells in you, he who raised up Christ Jesus from the dead will also give life to your mortal bodies through his Spirit who dwells in you.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Ernakulam, Kerala, India
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in Ernakulam, Kerala, India a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the county.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Spirit, guide seekers in Ernakulam, Kerala, India to the gospel through searching YouTube or TikTok today.
data.verse: I love those who love me, and those who seek me find me.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up every one you have called in Ernakulam, Kerala, India to become worthy of their calling, and offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to you through Jesus.
data.verse: I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the Arayan people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Father, we pray for every movement leader and disciple in the county of Ernakulam, Kerala, India that they would have deepening intimacy with you.
data.verse: On that day you will realize that I am in my Father, and you are in me, and I am in you.

data.prayer: Spirit, sanctify the 36,106 believers in Ernakulam and keep them blameless until Jesus returns.
data.verse: May the God of peace himself sanctify you completely. May your whole spirit, soul, and body be preserved blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ. He who calls you is faithful, who will also do it.

data.section_summary:
the county of Ernakulam, Kerala, India has a population of 3,282,400.

We estimate Ernakulam has 36,106 people who might know Jesus, 39,826 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 3,206,467 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, please raise up evangelists to equip your people to share the gospel in Ernakulam.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up
